constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 2 (Monday, January 4, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. MASSIE:
H.R. 24.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
This legislation is authorized by Article I, Section 8 of
the Constitution: ``To coin money, regulate the value
thereof, and of foreign coin, and fix the standard of weights
and measures;'' and ``To provide for the punishment of
counterfeiting the securities and current coin of the United
States.''
[Page H51]

latestAction.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Reform.

title: Federal Reserve Transparency Act of 2021
